entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening then changing to periods of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
